title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Scrub, 4.2 Ounce
description: Cleans deep into pores and helps stop breakouts before they start. This breakthrough formula features MicroClear a powerful technology clinically shown to boost delivery of acne medicine, clear congested pores and speed treatment deep to the source. MicroClear and gentle microbeads work together to cut through oil, dissolving dirt and impurities without overdrying or irritation. Skin is left clear and smooth.

title: NOW Foods Apricot Kernel Oil (Liquid), 16 oz
description: 100% Pure Moisturizing Oil  Softens Fine Lines  Treats Dry Hair   Condition: Prematurely aged skin, irritated skin, or need for an all natural dry hair treatment.  Solution: 100% Pure Apricot Oil is a rejuvenating natural oil that's ideal for softening fine lines and restoring a healthy glow to skin. Rich in essential fatty acids, this gentle oil has excellent restorative properties that promote soft, radiant hair and help to soothe irritated skin. Similar in structure and function to almond extracts, oils derived from apricot kernels will naturally nourish and moisturize your skin.  NOW® Solutions is the next step in the evolution of personal care products. The comprehensive natural line encompasses anti-aging moisturizers and serums, bath and body gels, shampoos and conditioners, oral care, skin care, and essential oils, all of which are formulated with the finest functional ingredients from around the world. NOW® Solutions products avoid harsh chemicals and synthetic ingredients in all of our formulations, to provide a more natural product line.

title: Now Foods -  Shea Butter Lotion 4 oz
description: Intense Repair  Extremely Dry, Rough Skin  10% Shea Butter  Paraben and Gluten Free   Condition: Dry, flaky skin on the body, especially on the rougher areas the knees, elbows and feet. title: Thermal Spa 49135 Professional U/V Gel Light Nail Dryer
description: Thermal spa professional u/v light gel dryer for beautiful manicures. with 45 watts of power reduces drying time for u/v top coat and gel applications. made with heavy-duty steel construction for durability, with a sleek design.

title: Burt's Bees Essential Everyday Beauty Kit
description: Pamper someone special naturally, with the Burt’s Bees Essential Gift Set. These beauty essentials include trial size portions of 5 perennial Burt’s Bees favorites, all made with natural ingredients. Soap Bark and Chamomile Deep Cleansing Cream moisturizes and softens the face while effectively removing makeup and dirt. Hand Salve, Naturally Nourishing Milk and Honey Body Lotion and Coconut Foot Cream each work to moisturize and smooth dry skin. Finally, Beeswax Lip Balm soothes dry lips with naturally conditioning beeswax. This beauty set includes skin care products to nourish the entire body. Give the gift of natural, with Burt’s Bees.

Aveeno Positively Nourishing Aveeno Ultra Hydrating Body Wash, 16 Ounce
description: Aveeno Positively Nourishing Hydrating Body Wash is good for your skin as it is for your senses.  This lightly fragranced, hydrating body wash contains shea butter, a natural ingredient known for its moisturizing properties, and is enriched with natural fig for healthierlooking skin that feels soft and smells great long after you shower.

title: Tweezerman  Brow Mousse
description: Styling gel shapes brows and keeps them in place.  Used by models and make-up artists, brow mousse is a clear, non-sticky gel that conditions brows and holds them in place for hours. Its superior hypo-allergenic formula will not flake or look gummy when dry.  Fragrance free.

title: e.l.f. Studio Small Angled Brush
description: Creates precise color application. Creates even, thin and straight lines every time. Use to apply lip color, eyebrow color, or to line eyes.

title: Creative Nail Shellac, Iced Coral, 0.25 Fluid Ounce
description: Just the icing on top. A beautiful light pink/coral shade packed with green and gold shimmer. CND's Iced Coral Shellac coats your beautiful manicure like smooth and delicious icing on a cake. This UV cured color coat applies on like polish, wears like a gel, but can be removed in minutes. Creat 14 days of superior color, no matter what you and your nails go through in a day. Simply set it and forget it. Improve your nails with a pratical and fearless armor color coat.
